member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.ConstructorInvokerGenerator.CreateDelegate(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic method for creating instances of the given type. The given type must have a public parameterless constructor.
member.param: The type of the instances to be created.
member.returns: A dynamic method for creating instances of the given type.
member.exception: The given type is an interface, or is abstract, or does not have a public parameterless constructor.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.ConstructorInvokerGenerator.CreateDelegate(System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic method for creating instances from the given .
member.param: The constructor from which instances will be created.
member.returns: A dynamic method for creating instances from the given constructor, the method receives an array as the arguments of the constructor.
member.exception: The declaring type of the construcor is abstract.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.ConstructorInvokerGenerator.CreateDelegate(System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic method for creating instances from the given and indicates whether to perform a arguments validation in the dynamic method.
member.param: The constructor from which instances will be created.
If true, the dynamic method will validate if the array of arguments is null and check the length of the array to avoid the exceptions such as or , an or will be thrown instead.
member.returns: A dynamic method for creating instances from the given constructor, the method receives an array as the arguments of the constructor.
member.exception: The declaring type of the construcor is abstract.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.CreateDynamicMethod(System.String,System.Type,System.Type[],System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an instance of .
member.param: The name of the dynamic method.
The return type of the dynamic method, null if the method has no return type.
An array of specifying the types of the parameters of the dynamic method, or null if the method has no parameters.
Specifies with which type the dynamic method is to be logically associated, if the type is an interface, the dynamic method will be associated to the module.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.BoxIfNeeded(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Performs a boxing operation if the given type is a value type.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.UnBoxIfNeeded(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Performs a unboxing operation (unbox.any) if the given type is a value type.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.CallMethod(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.CastValue(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Casts an object or value type passed by reference to the specified type and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.CastReference(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Casts an object or value type passed by reference to the specified type and pushes the object reference or the value type pointer of the result onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.LoadArgument(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Int16)
member.summary: Loads the argument at the specified index onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.LoadArgumentAddress(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Int16)
member.summary: Loads the address of the argument at the specified index onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.LoadInt32(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Int32)
member.summary: Pushes the integer value onto the evaluation stack as an int32.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.LoadLocalVariable(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Int16)
member.summary: Loads the local variable at the specified index onto the evaluation stack.
member.param: The index of the local variable.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.EmitUtils.LoadLocalVariableAddress(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Int16)
member.summary: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
member.param: The index of the local variable.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.MethodInvokerGenerator.CreateDelegate(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic method for invoking the method from the given .
member.param: The instance of from which the dyanmic method is to be created.
member.returns: The delegate has two parameters: the first for the object instance (will be ignored if the method is static), and the second for the arguments of the method (will be ignored if the method has no arguments)/ The return value of the delegate will be null if the method has no return value.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.MethodInvokerGenerator.CreateDelegate(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic method for invoking the method from the given and indicates whether to perform a arguments validation in the dynamic method.
member.param: The instance of from which the dyanmic method is to be created.
If true, the dynamic method will validate if the instance or the array of arguments is null and check the length of the array to avoid the exceptions such as or , an or will be thrown instead.
member.returns: The delegate has two parameters: the first for the object instance (will be ignored if the method is static), and the second for the arguments of the method (will be ignored if the method has no arguments)/ The return value of the delegate will be null if the method has no return value.

member.name: T:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention
member.summary: Provides a set of extention methods for for emitting the s.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Bge(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Bge_S(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Box(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a value type to an object reference (type O).

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Br(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Br_S(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction (short form).

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Brfalse(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction if value is false, a null reference, or zero.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Brfalse_S(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if value is false, a null reference, or zero.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Brtrue(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction if value is true, not null, or non-zero.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Brtrue_S(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.Emit.Label)
member.summary: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if value is true, not null, or non-zero.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Call(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Callvirt(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Calls a late-bound method on an object, pushing the return value onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Castclass(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Attempts to cast an object passed by reference to the specified class.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Conv_I(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to native int.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Conv_I1(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int8, then extends (pads) it to int32.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Conv_I2(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int16, then extends (pads) it to int32.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Conv_I4(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int32.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Conv_I8(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to int64.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Initobj(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes each field of the value type at a specified address to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Ldarg_0(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Loads the argument at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.

member.summary: Loads the argument at index 1 onto the evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Ret(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
member.summary: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Stloc_0(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Stloc_1(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)

member.name: M:cmstar.RapidReflection.Emit.OpCodeExtention.Stloc_2(System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator)
